Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23915 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-23915 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-5, affected by CVE-2023-23915
